subject: Re: [sugar] A few small fixes for the GUI's PresenceService client
body:
Hello Mike,

sounds good. I'm pretty excited about the work you are doing, I think it
will help a lot contributors and activity authors.

Next time please send code patches on the list before checking them in,
so that we can review them. Feel free to keep committing documentation
changes without approval.

Thanks!
Marco

_______________________________________________
Sugar mailing list
Sugar@laptop.org
http://mailman.laptop.org/mailman/listinfo/sugar
